manage.title: Methodology{newline} for managers
manage.note: We explain how to build information security in an organization according to regulatory requirements and international standards

citizens.title: Cyber Hygiene for Citizens
citizens.note: Topics include lessons on safe social media use, password management, and general digital hygiene practices.

news.title: News
news.note: Latest news, analysis, and event reviews in the world of information security.

awareness.title: Awareness
awareness.note: Welcome to our website dedicated to the important topic of information security for citizens

promo.title_1: Stay safe in the digital world!
promo.note_1: Awareness for citizens â€” quickly and easily secure yourself in the digital world! Just 15 minutes, and your level of information security will increase.
promo.note_2: Each lesson contains practical advice and useful tips designed specifically for citizens. Join and become part of a secure online community!

progamma.title: Training program
progamma.note: Raise your cyber resilience to a new level

protection.title: Protection
protection.note: Cyber hygiene ensures the protection of your personal information and financial data, preventing their leakage and theft.

safety.title: Safety
safety.note: Practicing cyber hygiene reduces the risk of infecting your computer with viruses and malware, ensuring the security of your devices and data.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.note: Proper cyber hygiene helps strengthen your passwords and accounts, making them less vulnerable to hacking.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.note: Awareness skills help recognize phishing and avoid online fraud.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.note: Cyber hygiene ensures safe and responsible behavior on social networks and online environments.

efficiency.title: Productivity
efficiency.note: Practicing cyber hygiene helps increase productivity and reduce stress when using the internet.

updates.title: Updates
updates.note: Regularly updating software and operating systems increases the security of your device.

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.note_1: Our methodology aims to enhance the level of information security in organizations and create a secure digital environment. The process includes analyzing current security measures, assessing their effectiveness, and implementing new solutions in accordance with regulatory requirements and international standards.
methodology.note_2: The main goal of the methodology is to help organizations adapt to changes in the field of cybersecurity and strengthen their protection against threats.

post.title: Posts
post.desc: You can read the posts related to the methodology.

news.title: News
news.desc: You can explore the news section on our website to learn more about the latest events and achievements in the field of information security.

methodology.accessDenied: To access the Methodology article, you need to
methodology.desc: Imagine that we are officials responsible for ensuring information security, or wish to become them in the future.
methodology.subDesc: What do you need to know and be able to do for this? Let's figure it out together!
methodology.disclaimer: Disclaimer: The authors do not claim absolute accuracy in the materials on information security (from the perspective of current regulatory legal acts of the Republic of Kazakhstan). The aim of the work is to improve the protection of your systems and raise staff awareness.

articles.1: What is information security and which documents regulate it?
articles.2: Who and why must comply with information security requirements in the Republic of Kazakhstan?
articles.4: What does the Information Security Department do?
articles.5: What is a SOC, and who needs it?
articles.6: What are compliance tests for information security requirements, who conducts them, and who needs to pass them?
articles.7: What is an audit of information systems, who conducts it, and who needs to pass it?
articles.8: What is an instrumental examination of information system components?
articles.9: What is the trusted software registry?
articles.10: What is the assurance level or compliance with ST RK ISO/IEC 15408-3?

about.note1: Welcome to our social project, which aims to help people better understand how to stay safe in the digital world and support cybersecurity professionals.
about.note2: We are MSSP.GLOBAL, a leading company in the field of cybersecurity. We will help protect your business from cyber threats through penetration testing, vulnerability analysis, creating a security system, and training in cybersecurity rules.
about.note3: We are always happy to hear your suggestions {link}
